articles.title: Google fixes Google News indexing bug - Search Engine Land
articles.description: This bug impacted the the traffic of may news publishers for a 3 week period.
articles.content: Google has confirmed it fixed the ongoing issue with Google News indexing. This resulted in many publishers seeing massive traffic declines from Google News for a three-week period, starting around J… [+760 chars]
